intro.title: Welcome to Lumora Horticulture
intro.description: As a leading manufacturer of rockwool plugs and growing trays, we serve professional growers throughout Europe. With our own production line, we guarantee consistent quality and direct delivery to wholesalers and professional gardeners.

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.description: Lumora Horticulture was founded from a passion for innovative horticultural solutions. With years of experience in the greenhouse horticulture sector, we have specialized in producing high-quality rockwool plugs that are perfectly tailored to the needs of modern growers.

production.title: Own Production
production.description: In our modern production facility, we manufacture thousands of rockwool plugs daily. Through complete control over the production process, we can flexibly respond to specific customer requirements and guarantee consistent product quality.
